mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ucare.receipt(receipt_dt, receipt_time, ins_dt, remark, bp, bs, user_no, patient_no, accept_yn) VALUES( now(), now(), now(), #{remark }, #{bp }, #{bs }, (SELECT user_no FROM ucare.user WHERE id = #{userId } ), #{patientNo }, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT A.receipt_no AS receiptNo, A.bp AS bp, A.bs AS bs, B.name AS name, B.gender AS gender, B.age AS age, B.address as address, B.insurance_yn AS insurance, B.diagnosis_type AS diagnosis, B.patient_no AS patientNo, A.receipt_dt AS receiptDt, TO_CHAR(receipt_time, 'HH24:MI:SS') as receiptTime, A.remark AS remark, (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) as no FROM ucare.receipt A INNER JOIN ucare.patient B ON A.patient_no = B.patient_no WHERE A.patient_no = #{patientNo } ORDER BY receipt_no DESC
SELECT name, password, tel_no AS telNo, split_part(email, '@', 1) as emailId, split_part(email, '@', 2) as email, address, birth FROM ucare.user WHERE id = #{id }
